record.field: What are the general need of your project?
Which features do you expect to have in the system (per module)?
Is there any existing system you use today for these features?
Is your existing data accessible easily (we can sign a NDA) so we can get a better understanding?
Do you have a key-user (usually manager level) able to follow-up the project totally ?"
Do you have a specific timeline for this project ?
